title: MS Ramaih cse vs PES RR cse (kcet)
content: Please state your opinions and reasons .I was fixed on joining pes but many of my friends are joining msrit so im confused.....I value placements and education more than staying close to those friends

comments.body:
>I value placements and education more than staying close to those friends

Your friends aren't gonna be happy hearing this ðŸ’€

Also choose PES RR CS. Much better option across various parameters.
yeah .... thanks for your opinion. I dont think they care because 10-12 of them r going together and i wasnt very close to them as they were hostelites and i was an localite
